coding.display: Neuropathy due to type 2 diabetes mellitus (disorder)

code.text: Neuropathy due to type 2 diabetes mellitus (disorder)

description.text: Improve and maintenance of optimal foot health: aim at early detection of peripheral vascular problems and neuropathy presumed due to diabetes; and prevention of diabetic foot ulcer, gangrene
Address patient knowledge deficit on diabetic self-care
